name: whale-tracker-mcp
description: A mcp server for tracking cryptocurrency whale transactions.

prompts.name: Fetch Recent Transactions
prompts.description: What are the latest whale transactions on Ethereum with a minimum value of $1,000,000?
prompts.text: What are the latest whale transactions on Ethereum with a minimum value of $1,000,000?

prompts.name: Analyze Whale Activity
prompts.description: Analyze recent whale transactions on Bitcoin.
prompts.text: Analyze recent whale transactions on Bitcoin.

WHALE_TRACKER_API_KEY.description: Environment variable to load the Whale Alert API key for the server.
